inspiration.subject_line: Reignite Your Style Journey with G-Star
inspiration.preheader: Remember the bold choices you made with G-Star? Let's create more unforgettable moments.
inspiration.hero_image_description: A dynamic image of a confident individual wearing G-Star's latest collection, standing in an urban setting, exuding style and determination.
inspiration.first_paragraph: We noticed you haven't been as active with us lately. At G-Star, we believe in pushing boundaries and making bold statements. Let's reignite that passion for unique style and innovation together.

first.template: You've achieved {{customer.highest_value_achieved}} in style milestones with us.
first.fallback: You've made significant style milestones with us.

second.template: Unlock potential savings of {{customer.potential_savings}} on your next purchase.
second.fallback: Discover exclusive savings on your next purchase.

nostalgia.preheader: From your first purchase to now, let's cherish the moments we've created together.
nostalgia.hero_image_description: A nostalgic image of a G-Star storefront with a timeline of iconic fashion moments, symbolizing the enduring relationship with the brand.
nostalgia.first_paragraph: We've shared some incredible style moments since {{customer.last_purchase_date}}. At G-Star, we value the history we've built with you and look forward to creating more timeless memories.

first.template: Your relationship with G-Star is valued at {{customer.relationship_value}}.
first.fallback: Your relationship with G-Star is invaluable.

second.template: You've enjoyed {{customer.lifetime_value}} in exclusive benefits with us.
second.fallback: You've enjoyed numerous exclusive benefits with us.

social_proof.preheader: Be part of a vibrant community that celebrates bold fashion choices and innovation.
social_proof.hero_image_description: A vibrant image of a diverse group of G-Star enthusiasts, showcasing their unique styles and celebrating their shared love for the brand.
social_proof.first_paragraph: Our community is thriving, and we miss your presence. At G-Star, we believe in the power of collective style and innovation. Let's reconnect and continue making bold fashion statements together.

first.template: You're ranked {{customer.community_rank}} in our vibrant community.
first.fallback: You're a valued member of our vibrant community.

second.template: Your engagement score of {{customer.engagement_score}} shows your impact in our community.
second.fallback: Your impact in our community is significant.
